title: Dalton area boy, 8, dies from accidental gunshot wound
content:
DALTON –– An 8-year-old boy died from an accidental gunshot wound late Tuesday afternoon at his home along South Mount Eaton Road.
Stephan J. Miller, 8, was accidentally shot by his 11-year-old brother, according to the Wayne County Sheriff's Office.
“It’s an unfortunate incident but it appears to be accidental,” Capt. Doug Hunter said.
The brothers were playing in the basement with firearms that were left unlocked and loaded, according to Hunter. While the boys were pretending to shoot at animals, Stephan Miller was shot in the chest with a 12-gauge shotgun, Hunter said.
